title: Pre-populate exercise library with 30 exercises

requirements.text: Add 30 pre-defined exercises to the backend exercise library with the following data: Alternating Single-Leg Squat (Free Weight, lower body), Machine Single-Leg Extensions (Machine, lower body), Single-Leg Hamstring Curls (Machine, lower body), Hip Adduction (Machine, lower body), Dumbbell Incline Bench Press (Dumbbell, chest), Machine Chest Press (Machine, chest), Machine Fly / Machine Chest Fly (Machine, chest), Dumbbell Chest Press (Dumbbell, chest), Machine Supported Row (Machine, back), Machine Lat Pulldown (Machine, back), Cable Row / Cable Back Rows (Cable, back), Closed-Grip Cable Lat Pulldowns (Cable, back), Machine Rear Delt Fly (Machine, shoulders), Machine Shoulder Raises (Machine, shoulders), Dumbbell Shoulder Press (Dumbbell, shoulders), Dumbbell Shoulder Raises (Dumbbell, shoulders), Cable Shoulder Face Pulls (Cable, shoulders), Preacher Bench Bicep Curls (Free Weight, biceps), Preacher Bench Hammer Curls (Free Weight, biceps), Dumbbell Incline Bicep Curls (Dumbbell, biceps), Dumbbell Hammer Curls (Dumbbell, biceps), Dumbbell Preacher Bench Hammer Curls (Dumbbell, biceps), Tricep Overhead Extension (Cable, triceps), Cable Tricep Overhead Extension (Cable, triceps), Tricep Pulldown (Cable, triceps), Reverse Grip Tricep Pulldown (Cable, triceps), Cable Tricep Pulldowns (Cable, triceps), Cable Pallof Press (Cable, core), Cable Low–High (Cable, core), Cable High–Low (Cable, core)

quotes: include these exercies: | Exercise | Machine Type | Muscle Group |

acceptanceCriteria: All 30 exercises are created in the backend with correct names, equipment types, and muscle groups
Exercise names match the provided table exactly including any special characters and capitalization
Equipment types are correctly mapped (Free Weight, Machine, Dumbbell, Cable)
Muscle groups are correctly mapped (lower body, chest, back, shoulders, biceps, triceps, core)

requirements.text: Ensure the existing seed functionality in the ExerciseLibrary page can populate these 30 exercises into the library when triggered
acceptanceCriteria: The seed button in ExerciseLibrary triggers creation of all 30 exercises
Exercises appear in the library after seeding with proper filtering capabilities
No duplicate exercises are created if seed is triggered multiple times

constraints: Do not modify the existing exercise data model or validation logic
Maintain the existing equipment type and muscle group validation in the backend
nonGoals: Adding any exercises beyond the 30 specified in the table
Modifying the UI layout or styling of the exercise library
Creating workout templates using these exercises
